name: AI Chat - Claude
description: Executes a one-off prompt to Anthropic Claude and returns the generated text result
introductoryText:
![Anthropic Claude](data:image/png;base64,)
### AI Chat with Anthropic Claude
#### Executes a one-off prompt request for each row in the input block, and output the results from Claude using the specified text generation / chat completion model

options.name: Model
options.title: Model
options.description: E.g. claude-3-opus-20240229   . The model as per Anthropic API name.

options.name: Temperature
options.title: Temperature
options.description: The model temperature typically from 0 to 1

options.name: SystemPrompt
options.title: System Prompt
options.description: Helps set the behavior of the model / AI assistant

options.name: Prompt
options.title: User Prompt
options.description: Point to the field that contains the prompt to execute
